column4: By uncommenting the deb http and deb src it can draw packages from there.
Basically it skips anything with a ## in front of it.
What I think is happening is you don't have the commented, therefore you can't get packages.
Ok now run sudo apt-get update
and try the java thing again. I swear it works because i just did it like 3 hours ago.
I just had to fresh install everything.
I know I"m probably the last person to dish out advice on anything but...
